vote.title: Authorize an amendment to the conditional grant agreement with St. Jude, Inc. for the rehabilitation of 180 permanent supportive housing units to modify the income restrictions at or below 30% Area Median Income (AMI) at or below 50% AMI for 60% of the units and at or below 80% AMI for 40% of the units at the St. Jude Center - Park Central, a permanent supportive housing development located 8102 Lyndon B. Johnson Freeway, Dallas, Texas 75251 - Financing: No cost consideration to the City

Johnson Freeway, Dallas, Texas 75251 - Financing: No cost consideration to the City
